name: The greatest Architect
description:
Welcome to the great city of Babel. You have been summoned by the king for his latest extravagant project. Will you complete the assignment in time or will you be unable to live up to the kings expectations?

 In this short game you take the role of a royal architect responsible for building a tower tall enough to reach the gods. You can hire new workers by clicking buttons in the hiring menu and upgrade stations by clicking the upgrade sign next to them. Your only goal is to build as many levels of the tower as you're assigned to before your time runs out.

Controls:
mouse
W - create miner
B - create builder
T - create transporter
Escape - quit game
